_header: I shall you tell with hearty mood
Title(s): On the Three Kings of Cullen
_description:
On the Three Kings of Cullen, applied to the Alchemical Art — fifteen couplets [Singer (1928)
XSinger, Dorothea Waley. Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts. 3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31, 854]

BLHar2407.First Lines: I schal yow tel wyth hert modeof þre kynggys þat ben so goud…
BLHar2407.Last Lines: …in to hys blyse now come weeamen goud lord for cheytee
BLHar2407.Editions:
Ashmole,  Elias. 
             Theatrum Chemicum Britannicum.
         London: J. Grimond, 1652: 350-1.
Gray,  Douglas. 
             The Oxford Book of Late Medieval Verse and Prose.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1985: 141.
